forward_snippets: Based on currently available information, we believe it is remote that future costs related to known contingent liability exposures will exceed current accruals by an amount that would have a material adverse impact on our consolidated financial statements.
We expect to incur a substantial amount of these expenditures within the next 30 years.
We will continue to defend ourselves vigorously in these matters.
We have contingent liabilities resulting from throughput agreements with pipeline and processing companies not associated with financing arrangements.
We expect to incur a substantial amount of these expenditures within the next 30 years.
